metadata.title: CVE-2024-24476 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Wireshark team Wireshark before v.4.2.0allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via thepan/addr_resolv.c, and ws_manuf_lookup_str(), size components.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
